title: [安全|付费]DakataAntiCheat[DAC]——新一代的反作弊插件[1.8-1.11]
author: q211316907
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 18:02 编辑 


此插件已经开发接近接近6个月——如果按7月原贴这样写的话,这个插件已经开发了一年了

DAC 根据最新的作弊而制作而成的

插件论坛- dakataac.tk/forum - 你可以提交错误,检测不到的bug,将用最短的时间解决你的问题,如果你想帮助开发这款反作弊插件,请多上官网讨论
如果想要更好的PVP保护,推荐NoCombatHacks和DAC一起使用, 脚本插件嘛,它作者真的很好,有问题都会帮你解决的并且脚本插件完全支持DAC! -  -
原贴的字为什么那么大!!!!

首次添加音乐!!!!
还有这插件不比AAC差
有空专门搞个与AAC的对比


DAC即将添加的内容!!!!


1. New fly check——重新编写飞行的检测
2. Fix false positives——解决部分误报
3. Fix API——修复API
4. Improve SlimeJump protection——优化slimejump保护
5. Add function to disable badpackets on spawn
6. Improve AntiBot proxy
7. Improve AntiBot system
8. Improve NoFall
9. Make full support to 1.11 (40%)——完整支持1.11,进度40％
10. Make auto updater
11. Add more ban modes——添加更多ban的处罚模式
12. Block checkerclimb
13. Improve killaura protection——优化killaura的检测,杀戮光环
14. Improve chat protection
15. Block Tracers
16. Improve ScaffoldWalk protection
就这样吧,随便挑了几个说说
17. Improve Blink protection
啊,接下来介绍介绍特色
这是支持检测的功能
1.Movement:
Spider|Climb
Jetpack|AirWalk
VanillaFly
CreativeFly
SurvivalFly
NCPFly
GlideFly
BoatFly
SleepFly
Sneak|SilentSneak
Phase
NoClip
VClip
Step
NoFall
Timer
Blink
Jesus|WaterWalk
NoSlowdown
AntiCactus|NoCactus
FastLadder
ElytraFly|ExtraElytra (1.9)
NoWeb
Teleport
Speed
Buzz
FastFall
NoHunger
ArrowDodge
ItemVac
HighJump
Headless
MotionClip
VerticalPhase
Glide
PositionSpoof
InvWalk
2.Chat:

Spam
ASCII
Anti swear system
Anti advertising system (ip's and web pages)
Anti CAPS system
3.Combat:

KillAura(BETA)
MultiAura
TP-Aura
NoKnockback|NoVelocity
SelfHurt
GodMode
Magnet Punch
ForceField
Regen|FastHeal
Reach
FastBow
AutoClicker
Criticals
4.Block:

BedFucker
Nuker(Any form)
FastPlace
NoBreakDelay
Build
GhostHand
NoSwing
AutoSign
BuildRandom
Kaboom
Tunneller
Liquids
InstantBunker
InstantMine|CivBreak
Tower
ScaffoldWalk
4.Other:

KillPotion|KillerPotion
TrollPotion|TrollerPotion
FastEat
Throw
AutoSteal
AutoArmor
AutoSoupBedGodModeAntiFireForcePushAntiPotionBonemealAura

Chat: DAC有还有专门的聊天检测系统,可以检测swear,spam,其他服的IP!以及网站广告!

Bot protection: DAC checks every joined player for proxy with his large anti proxy database!
这大概在说: DAC会慢慢检测每个加入的玩家

WordDownloader: DAC可以防止下载地图!就是WordDownloader

Advanched: DAC可以检测70+种作弊,并且都经过测试服务器验证过的,能防御!

Very Informative: DAC send info for all hacks that are blocked to prevent false positives!
这大概在说: DAC发现作弊者的过程都是加密的,防止误报,防止误报是真的

Ping Spoof: DAC通过ping来检测玩家是否利用作弊来降低ping以跳过反作弊的,这可能会误报,有些人网络确实不好

Lightweight: 我不能说DAC会彻底的无卡顿,但这是每个优秀的反作弊应该做的,但是我敢说DAC一定不比其他反作弊更卡顿!以上作者原话,滞后翻译成卡顿

GUI: 可以通过gui页面来配置!不像其他反作弊需要打开config配置!这个功能我给☆☆☆☆☆好评

Support: 我会回答你的所有问题,在1-2天内 - 早上10点到晚上10点 (UTC +3)(在官网中)

Configurable: 你可以在config中配置任何信息

Areas: DAC可以跳过检测领地!这个功能我也给☆☆☆☆☆好评

Per World Check: DAC支持特定的世界关闭某个检测

Report system: DAC可以在gui页面中提交给你某人在某地啥啥的作弊了什么很详细,你也可以移除报告

Thresholds: 当有人作弊的时候你可以自定义执行什么指令
然后说说如果你想在玩家作弊飞行第一次的时候警告他,第二次的时候ban他,打开config像下面这样配置
Fly:
 thresholds:
 10: warn <player> Do not fly
 20: ban <player> You was banned for flying
看不懂就是你理解力问题了- -

插件价格7.6USD,52块
要买的赶快,不然像AAC那样涨价就不会了

开发API
Event - PlayerCheatEvent
Methods:
getPlayer()
getPing()
getTPS()
isKicked()
getCheatType()
setCheatType()
isCanseled()
setCanseled()
getHandlers()


卧槽- -我会了!我知道怎么嵌入视频了- -

还有什么作弊的提交给作者,让作者去测试


Dakata.Commands - Permission to execute all commands

Dakata.Admin - All players with this permission will receive information about the hackers(If log-player is true)

Dakata.Bypass.<hack> - Permission to bypass <hack>

Dakata.Bypass - Permission to bypass every hack

For KillPotion and TrollPotion - Dakata.Bypass.InvalidPotion

For Speed, Blink, ItemVac, Magnet Punch And GodMode - Dakata.Bypass.InvalidMove

For GhostHand, BuildRandom, Liquids, breaking and placing blocks out of the block they look - Dakata.Bypass.InvalidBlock

For WorldDownload client - Dakata.Bypass.WorldDownload

For ASCII|FancyChat chat - Dakata.Bypass.Chat.ASCII

For ASCII|FancyChat command - Dakata.Bypass.Command.ASCII

For CAPS - Dakata.Bypass.Chat.Caps

For Chat spam- Dakata.Bypass.Chat.Spam

For Command spam- Dakata.Bypass.Command.Spam

For Swear - Dakata.Bypass.Chat.Swear

For Advertisement for web pages - Dakata.Bypass.Chat.Advertisement.Web

For Advertisement for ip's - Dakata.Bypass.Chat.Advertisement.IP

For AntiBot - Dakata.Bypass.AntiBot

For Blocked-cmd - Dakata.Bypass.Command.Blocked-Cmd

For Sign ASCII - Dakata.Bypass.Sign.ASCII


Dakata - Main command
Dakata info <player> - Give info about the player
Dakata spy <player> - Spy player
Dakata stopAllChecks <time> - Stop all checks for <time>(in seconds)
Dakata reload - Reload config
Dac - Show a GUI with the player list with functions to manipulate them(If have a idea say it to me)
Dakata version - Show the version of the plugin
Dakata ping <player> - Show the ping of a player
Dakata clear - If U have lagg execute this command
Dakata region <add/remove> <regionName> - Add, remove bypassed residence regions
Dakata report <player> - Report a player

1.Maho24 - 他测试的外挂
2.kkkeeeddd -For the obfuscator
3.PandasIsBae - For couple of thinks
4.Vinc0682 - The creator on NTAC - For support me and show some bypasses
5.CroNexusGamer - Show me some false positives, give me support and because he is cool ^^
6._DragonNoid_ - For helping with the dev api
7. AndalmereCraft - He is really cool, and have one really good script, i recommend it to use DAC with NoCombatHacks
8.ByCooky58 - For the awesome logo and images
特别感谢提交意见、bug的人
购买这个插件你需要遵守这些
You are not permitted to redistribute the plugin in any form, including as a part of any software package.You are not permitted to decompile or modify the plugin in any form.You will not receive any refunds for this plugin, without the yml files.You will not file a chargeback, dispute, or perform any similar action. Doing so will result in your licence revoked along with further action from SpigotMCYou agree to make an effort to get help (by PM'ing me or make a thread in our forum,) if you are having problems, before leaving a review, and you are allowed to post a review 2 days after the day which you say your problem, if we not answer youWe reserve the right to change these Terms at any time, and you agree to abide by the most recent version of this.


如果某些检测不生效,请在config中写更高的数值或者-1来禁用

如果你的config不一样了,请删除他


QAQ——FAQ

1.Can I get the source code - No
2. Can I help you with the ac - You can only help me by saying bypasses and bugs
3. Are the settings optimized - Not fully, I make it to stop the cheaters and to don't have much false positives, I suggest to change the most of the settings
4. Can I give DAC to other server owners- No
5. Is DAC have auto ban system - Yes, there are thresholds which you can run any command that u want
6. Can I use NCP or any other ac with DAC - Some ac make false positives with DAC
7. Is DAC support other plugins - Yes, if you want I to support other plugin, just say
8. I found a bypass, what i will do now?- First please see the settings file and then pm me
9. Can I sell optimized settings and config file - Yes
10. Can you work as anticheat developer in my server - No
